data.lyric:
[ti:I Know (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Know (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:00.09]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett/D Mac/Tahj Vaughn/Thomas Horton
[00:00.18]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett/D Mac/Tahj Vaughn/Thomas Horton
[00:00.28]Pipe that s**t up TnT
[00:02.48]Dmac on the f**king track
[00:04.39]Tahj Money
[00:10.83]Bondin' over d**gs and pain dirty Sprite share
[00:13.26]My dawg was one of a kind I know your type rare
[00:16.18]I know life is a b***h and she don't fight fair
[00:18.77]How the f**k I wake up from a dream to a nightmare
[00:22.00]Left us behind you seen that light glare
[00:23.99]I know you walkin' up to Heaven on them white stairs
[00:27.10]Why I can't just pull up to your crib and see you right there
[00:30.01]Nobody love you 'til you dead that's when they might care
[00:33.61]Let's just be friends before we rush into a label
[00:36.47]Wanna know if you really f**k with me girl what's your angle
[00:39.20]It's only for the better if I'm tryna change you
[00:42.23]Lovin' me ain't easy if you leave I don't blame you
[00:45.17]Trauma got me f**ked up so I'm mentally unstable
[00:48.15]I got wrapped up in my emotions now I'm tangled
[00:51.06]Deep in my thoughts and overthinkin' can get painful
[00:53.96]Watch how I move one wrong decision can be fatal
[00:56.91]Hidden messages conversations with my angels
[00:59.75]Just walk with me and you'll see I'm tryna save you
[01:02.44]Most times I'm by myself I'm still confused from betrayal
[01:05.74]From rags to riches s**t still hard I'm just on phase two
[01:09.00]Bondin' over d**gs and pain dirty Sprite share
[01:11.40]My dawg was one of a kind I know your type rare
[01:14.36]I know life is a b***h and she don't fight fair
[01:17.06]How the f**k I wake up from a dream to a nightmare
[01:19.83]Left us behind you seen that light glare
[01:22.35]I know you walkin' up to Heaven on them white stairs
[01:25.34]Why I can't just pull up to your crib and see you right there
[01:28.19]Nobody love you 'til you dead that's when they might care
[01:32.47]Livin' on his own and he runnin' out of options now
[01:35.11]'Cause he felt like he couldn't be hisself at his mama house
[01:38.14]Hittin' licks missin' school junior year he thought 'bout droppin' out
[01:41.14]Him against the world 40 on him when he poppin' out
[01:43.96]On his dark road he's just tryna find a proper route
[01:46.91]Hate the criticism he uses music to block it out
[01:49.27]By his auntie he was molested as a baby boy
[01:52.18]Messed up his head it even changed the way he play with toys
[01:55.09]Up late night rappin' and they told him to quit makin' noise
[01:57.97]Stuck in his feelings he be spendin' every day annoyed
[02:00.91]He wanna stand over a n***a leave his face destroyed
[02:03.87]He miss his hood now this something that he can't avoid
[02:06.96]Bondin' over d**gs and pain dirty Sprite share
[02:09.76]My dawg was one of a kind I know your type rare
[02:12.52]I know life is a b***h and she don't fight fair
[02:15.39]How the f**k I wake up from a dream to a nightmare
[02:18.46]Left us behind you seen that light glare
[02:20.53]I know you walkin' up to Heaven on them white stairs
[02:23.42]Why I can't just pull up to your crib and see you right there
[02:26.38]Nobody love you 'til you dead that's when they might care
data.trans:
[ti:I Know (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:THE GOAT (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.09]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.28]TnTXD制作
[00:02.48]Dmac制作
[00:04.39]Tahj Money制作
[00:10.83]**和疼痛让我受尽折磨 分享特调饮料
[00:13.26]我的兄弟独一无二 我知道你很特别
[00:16.18]我知道生活不会尽如人意 毫无公平可言
[00:18.77]要不然我怎会从梦中醒来 陷入无尽的噩梦里
[00:22.00]将我们抛在身后 你看见我们闪闪发光
[00:23.99]我知道你依靠别人的力量平步青云
[00:27.10]为何我不直接去你家 在那里与你见面
[00:30.01]没有人爱你 直到你离开人世 才会有人关心你
[00:33.61]在我们出人头地以前 让我们做朋友吧
[00:36.47]我想知道你是否真心和我在一起 女孩 你的想法是什么
[00:39.20]如果我试图改变你 那一定希望你越变越好
[00:42.23]爱我并非易事 如果你想离开 我不会怪你
[00:45.17]可是心理创伤让我痛不欲生 因此我的情绪不太稳定
[00:48.15]我沉浸在我的情绪里 如今我纠结不已
[00:51.06]我思绪万千 总是想太多 让我苦不堪言
[00:53.96]看着我一错再错 一着不慎 满盘皆输
[00:56.91]我屏蔽所有信息 与自己的心灵对话
[00:59.75]只要与我并肩而行 你会明白我竭力想拯救你
[01:02.44]大多数时候 我形单影只 我依然对背叛迷惑不解
[01:05.74]从一贫如洗到腰缠万贯 生活依然艰辛无比 前路漫漫 仍需努力
[01:09.00]**和疼痛让我受尽折磨 分享特调饮料
[01:11.40]我的兄弟独一无二 我知道你很特别
[01:14.36]我知道生活不会尽如人意 毫无公平可言
[01:17.06]要不然我怎会从梦中醒来 陷入无尽的噩梦里
[01:19.83]将我们抛在身后 你看见我们闪闪发光
[01:22.35]我知道你依靠别人的力量平步青云
[01:25.34]为何我不直接去你家 在那里与你见面
[01:28.19]没有人爱你 直到你离开人世 才会有人关心你
[01:32.47]自力更生 如今他别无选择
[01:35.11]因为他觉得在妈妈家里无法真正地做自己
[01:38.14]干着非法勾当 逃学 他突然想到辍学
[01:41.14]他独自与世界抗衡 他出现的时候手里拿着枪
[01:43.96]他在黑暗的道路上摸索 只想找到适合自己的路
[01:46.91]对外界的批评深恶痛绝 他用音乐屏蔽嘈杂
[01:49.27]他小时候遭到阿姨的非人虐待
[01:52.18]他思想混乱 甚至改变了他玩玩具的方法
[01:55.09]彻夜练习说唱 大家都斥责他 让他别制造噪音
[01:57.97]他郁郁寡欢 每天都心烦意乱
[02:00.91]他想找人发泄一下 把人揍到面目全非
[02:03.87]他想念他长大的那个街区 可如今不能逃避现实
[02:06.96]**和疼痛让我受尽折磨 分享特调饮料
[02:09.76]我的兄弟独一无二 我知道你很特别
[02:12.52]我知道生活不会尽如人意 毫无公平可言
[02:15.39]要不然我怎会从梦中醒来 陷入无尽的噩梦里
[02:18.46]将我们抛在身后 你看见我们闪闪发光
[02:20.53]我知道你依靠别人的力量平步青云
[02:23.42]为何我不直接去你家 在那里与你见面
[02:26.38]没有人爱你 直到你离开人世 才会有人关心你
